Title: Quarterly Bulletin Economic and Monetary Developments (Issue No.1)
Key Findings: Real GDP contracted by 5% in 2020; Inflation exceeded 17% in September 2020; Broad money (M2) grew by 8.5% in 2019; Budget deficit of 703 billion rials in 2019 (7.9% of GDP); Current account deficit of -4.4% of GDP in 2019.
Economic Indicators: GDP, Inflation, Exchange Rate, Monetary Aggregates, Public Finance, Balance of Payments, External Debt

Title: The Annual Report 2020
Key Findings: GDP contracted by 8.5% in 2020; Annual inflation rate rose to 35% at the end of 2020; Broad money (M2) increased by 15% in 2020; Budget deficit of 782 billion riyals in 2020; Balance of payments deficit of $465.1 million in 2020.
Economic Indicators: GDP, Inflation, Monetary Aggregates, Public Finance, Balance of Payments, External Debt
